main event: An unidentified circular object was observed at Pope Air Force Base on 10/00/1950.
interesting points: The object was circular in shape and approximately 30-50 ft in diameter., It was white in color and hovered with a darting motion., Ground radar could not track the object during the observation., Several Air Force officers observed the object., The object disappeared from view while following a course of 280°/25°.
witness description: Air Force officers at the base
